divs: sighting detailsi was on my work and at ten forty pm and as i got to the top of a big hill,bright green lights came from above and were hitting the car and ground all around me. must of been 30 or more. it was almost like a strobe light. i could see them hitting the car hood ,windows and probably 50 feet to the sides of the road. the whole thing happened quick. maybe 5 seconds.i first noticed the lights in my mirror shooting across my back window and at first i thought it was an emergency vehicle then noticed no one was behind me. then the lights were all over my car and to the sides of the road. at the time it made me very scared not knowing what just happened. i have only mentioned it to my wife. i google it and came across a guy in pennsylvania who had a similar thing happen to him. my question is have you heard of this kind of thing happen to anyone else? every night when i pass this area i think about that night and wonder what it could of been. thanks [name removed\cms\tg]
Summary: Had bright green lights shoot all over the ground around my car while driving.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Cortland
There were no other sightings in Cortland on or around May 15th 2012
